definition: affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
Standing Committee of the National People's Congress
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4 Chang2 wu4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

definition: standing committee (e.g. of National People's Congress)

sentences.english: Member of China Korea Japan culture exchange association.
sentences.chinese: 中国名人文化艺术交流中心常务理事。

sentences.english: Barbara agreed to conduct the meeting pending the election of a permanent chairman.
sentences.chinese: 巴巴拉同意主持那个会议直到选举出常务主席。

sentences.english: Its permanent body is the Standing Committee of the National People’s Congress.
sentences.chinese: 它的常设机关是全国人民代表大会常务委员会。

sentences.english: Once a member of the Standing Committee of the Consultative Committee for the Basic Law of MSAR.
sentences.chinese: 曾任澳门基本法咨询委员会常务委员。

sentences.english: Jade sentimental hand can not run out, the king of the glass cup.
sentences.chinese: 玉多情手不了侮辱跑了出去，金常务摔掉杯子泄气。

sentences.english: The establishment of adjudicatory apparatus and administrative offices of the maritime courts shall be decided by the Supreme People's Court.
sentences.chinese: 海事法院对所在地的市人民代表大会常务委员会负责。

sentences.english: His fourth wife is an executive director at SJM.
sentences.chinese: 他的第四人夫人还是SJM的常务董事。

sentences.english: Zhang is vice chairman and an executive director of the company.
sentences.chinese: 张春江是中移动的副总裁兼常务董事。

sentences.english: Sri Mulyani Indrawati is Managing Director of the World Bank Group and a former finance minister of Indonesia.
sentences.chinese: 世界银行集团常务董事，曾任印尼财政部长。

sentences.english: Now, we welcome Mr. Zhang Xiaolin, Executive Vice Mayor of Hefei to deliver his remarks.
sentences.chinese: 下面首先请合肥市常务副市长张晓麟先生致辞。

sentences.english: Now He is the managing director of the Clinical Branch of China Acupuncture and Moxibustion Association.
sentences.chinese: 现任中国针灸学会临床分会常务理事。

sentences.english: Standing Vice President Jiang Yiman of the Red Cross Society of China (RCSC) was present at the signing ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 中国红十字会常务副会长江亦曼参加了签字仪式。

sentences.english: DSG receives the decorated cans already necked in, he says.
sentences.chinese: 常务副秘书长收到装饰已领罐中，他说。

sentences.english: The advisers shall be appointed or removed by the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.
sentences.chinese: 顾问由全国人民代表大会常务委员会任免。

sentences.english: Any law returned by the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress shall immediately be invalidated.
sentences.chinese: 经全国人民代表大会常务委员会发回的法律立即失效。

sentences.english: Executive vice president of Shanghai Conservatory of Music.
sentences.chinese: 是上海音乐学院常务副院长徐孟东先生。

definition: head of a (government etc) department/section chief/section head/secretary/minister/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
